Keywords: Exiles , Past , Politician , Soldier , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Miguel O'Hara
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed team, characters on your starting force with the Soldier keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!: When Spider-Man 1776 hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
THE GENERAL THAT FOUNDED A NATION: Leadership, Super Senses. // When Spider-Man 1776 hits, until your next turn opposing forces have Action Total -1 (minimum 2). // Opposing characters within 6 squares can�t use Leadership or Autonomous.
WE SHALL NOT ALLOW THE BRITISH TO RULE US: STOP. Combat Reflexes, Toughness.
Figure Errata
